strength_details: Clear responsibilities focused on BI/DW reporting and ETL with specific tool requirements
Established company (IBM) with global presence and stability
Role is specifically data-focused with no scope creep into other engineering domains
concern_details: Legacy tech stack (Cognos, DataStage) with limited modern cloud exposure
Location restricted to Pune, India - no visa sponsorship mentioned
Limited growth opportunities and innovation signals in job description
Onsite work model may imply client-driven deadlines and potential overtime
best_fit_details: Mid-level engineers with 3+ years experience in BI/DW and Cognos/DataStage
Candidates seeking stable roles in established companies with legacy systems
Engineers with some cloud exposure (AWS/Azure/GCP) who can adapt to legacy environments
probe_details: Ask about the actual tech stack and modernization plans for the BI/DW environment
Understand expected work hours and any on-call or overtime requirements
Inquire about career progression opportunities within IBM's delivery centers
leverage_details: Strong Cognos and DataStage experience is a key differentiator for this role
Experience with IBM tools and delivery center environments is valuable
summary.overall_assessment: Stable opportunity for mid-level data engineers seeking roles in established companies with legacy BI/DW systems. Clear role definition and IBM's stability are strengths, but the legacy tech stack and limited growth signals are concerns. Best suited for candidates with specific Cognos/DataStage experience who value stability over innovation.
